name: Forgelin 1.8.4
body: Update Kotlin to 1.3.50, Coroutines to 1.3.1, and fix JDK7/8 stdlib modules not being shadowed.

name: Forgelin 1.8.3
body: - Update Kotlin to 1.3.40 and Coroutines to 1.2.1 (thanks to @NikkyAI for doing all the work)

name: Forgelin 1.8.2
body:
- Update to Kotlin 1.3.10 and Coroutines 1.0.1
- Fix dependencies not being bundled

name: Forgelin 1.7.3
body: - Only attempt to register object event handlers for mods that use KotlinAdapter

name: Forgelin 1.7.0
body:
- Update Kotlin
- Properly register Kotlin objects annotated with `@EventBusSubscriber`

name: Forgelin 1.4.2
body:
- Update Kotlin to 1.1.2
- Add JetBrains Annotations
- Add Kotlin Coroutines

name: Forgelin 1.2.0
body:
- Update Kotlin to 1.0.6
- Clean up language adapter
